title: Ep 1937 - Iyer Surprises Babita
shortDesc: Jethalal receives a call from Babita, who informs him about her plans to go on an African Safari during this Diwali vacation. Moreover, she informs Jethalal that she wants to give a surprise to Iyer by gifting him a latest smart phone

title: Ep 1938 - Sonus vacation camp
shortDesc: Today’s episode continues with Bhide secretly taking out Sonu’s summer vacation camp luggage from his flat. Bhide is seen rushing on his Shakharam to give the luggage bag to Sonu but it is then he is interrupted by Popatlal.

title: Ep 1939 - Popatlals Ujjain Trip
shortDesc: Jethalal and his friends are waiting for Popatlal at the soda shop. They are seen gossiping and enjoying their time with each other. It’s getting late and still Popatlal has not joined them at the Soda shop. Sodhi calls Popatlal and finds out .

title: Ep 1940 - Madhvis Aam Ka Business
shortDesc: Today’s episode continues with Daya convincing Madhvi to start a new business this summer season. She advises her to start selling Mangoes in the market. And interestingly Anjali too has suggests her to start the mango selling business!

title: Ep 1941 - Confusion in Madhvis New Business
shortDesc: Madhvi is seen taking orders for supplying mangoes to her customers. She is very excited by the overwhelming response for pre-booking of orders; and she starts thinking about a huge profit which she will make by working from home.

title: Ep 1942 - Gokuldham Mein Aam Ka Jaadu
shortDesc: The Mango seller Ganpat Rao has come to the Gokuldham Society with a mini truck full of Mangoes. He has arrived little late and all the impatient customers are waiting to have the best quality of mangoes this season!

title: Ep 1943 - Madhvis Loss in Her New Business
shortDesc: Today’s episode continues with everyone in Gokuldham society enjoying the taste of famous Ratnagiri mangoes. Madhvi too is very happy thinking that she has earned a handsome amount of profit by selling the mangoes to her customers

title: Ep 1944 - Sunder helps Madhvi
shortDesc: Today’s episode revolves around Madhvi’s loss in her new business. She is feeling very disheartened and in order to repay the excess amount to the mango wholesaler, she meets Jethalal to seek some financial help from him.

title: Ep 1945 - Gogis results awaited
shortDesc: Today’s episode continues with Bhide informing Roshan about Gogi’s results which is expected to come by the next day. On hearing this Roshan starts doing Bhangra and it left Bhide in a shock! He tries to explain that results are not out yet

title: Ep 1946 - Sodhis Excitement before Gogis SSC Result
shortDesc: Today’s episode begins with Bhide’s tension for Gogi’s SSC results. He is getting little scared thinking about Sodhi’s excitement and preparation which he is doing for his son’s result.

title: Ep 1947 - Gogi Ka SSC Result
shortDesc: Today’s episode continues with the residents of Gokuldham Society gathering in the club house to check Gogi’s SSC result. Even before the formal announcement of SSC result; everyone has started celebrating

title: Ep 1948 - Celebrations for Gogis Result
shortDesc: In Today’s episode begins with Gogi’s school teacher informing Roshan about his SSC result. The school teacher’s informs that Gogi has become a school topper with his marvelous performance in the SSC exams.

title: Ep 1949 - Phone Banned In Gada Electronics
shortDesc: Today’s episode continues with Bagha recalling the decision of Jethalal of banning mobile phones inside his shop. He is in tension thinking that from now onwards he will be unable to talk with Bawri during his working hours!

title: Ep 1950 - Bawri Aur Bagha Ka Chakravyuh
shortDesc: Jethalal is in tension thinking about Bawri’s habit of coming to Gada Electronics; he feels that it is because of her, Bagha is unable to concentrate on his work. However, Daya suggests Jethalal to tie the knots of Bawri and Bagha

title: Ep 1951 - Bawri Aur Bagha Wali Samasya
shortDesc: Today’s episode continues with Jethalal rushing to meet Taarak Mehta to find a permanent solution to Bagha and Bawri’s problem. He informs Taarak that Bawri’s parents are planning to come Mumbai to meet Bagha.
